name: Man In Camo: addiction
description: A clip from the feature documentary movie about the artist “Man In Camo” growing up in the DC punk rock scene then moving to New York and working as a bartender in the Lower East Side for more than 15 years you see what addiction can do. I don't believe drugs make you more talented. I don't believe that anyone derives talent from any substance. It's OK if you want to put it in your body that's your choice. But don't claim it's the source of your talent. We're all better than that.
